clearOnCancel.description: Whether to clear the input after the cancel button is clicked
clearOnCancel.description_zh: 点击取消按钮后是否清除输入

clearable.description: Whether to enable the clear icon, the input would be cleared after the clear icon is clicked
clearable.description_zh: 是否启用清除图标，点击清除图标后将清除输入

maxLength.description: The maximum number of characters the user can enter
maxLength.description_zh: 用户可以输入的最大字符数

showCancelButton.description: Whether to display the cancel button on the right side of the search input
showCancelButton.description_zh: 是否在搜索输入右侧显示取消按钮

events.name: onBlur
events.description: Triggered when the input lose focus

events.name: onCancel
events.description: Triggered when the cancel button is clicked

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when the input content is changed

events.name: onClear
events.description: Triggered when the clear button is clicked

events.name: onFocus
events.description: Triggered when the input get focus
events.description_zh: 当输入获得焦点时触发

events.name: onSearch
events.description: Triggered when the enter key is input

events.name: onlyShowClearWhenFocus
events.description: If true, the clear button will only be displayed when the input box is focused. If false, the clear button will still be displayed after the input box loses focus.
events.description_zh: 如果为 true，则仅在输入框聚焦时才会显示清除按钮。如果为 false，则在输入框失去焦点后仍将显示清除按钮。
